data.actual_result: You get disconnected from the voice chat and reconnected shortly after
data.expected_result: Everything works as normal and you don't get disconnected
data.short_description: User gets Disconnected from a Voice Chat when trying to use Dms
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice chat in any server - Go to DMs - Try to start typing something - If that doesn't work, change DM Conversations
